thread.title: Malaysia's ex-PM gives more answers to anti-graft agents

title: Malaysia's ex-PM gives more answers to anti-graft agents
text:
Malaysia's ex-PM gives more answers to anti-graft agents 1:21pm BST - 01:50
Former Malaysian leader Najib Razak returns to an anti-graft agency to explain why millions of dollars suspiciously ended up in his account just two weeks after a shocking election defeat ended his near decade long rule. Sareena Dayaram reports.
Former Malaysian leader Najib Razak returns to an anti-graft agency to explain why millions of dollars suspiciously ended up in his account just two weeks after a shocking election defeat ended his near decade long rule. Sareena Dayaram reports. //reut.rs/2IFvc6Z
